title: I finished gold in season 6 and didn't receive my rewards (summoner icon,maokai skin , etc.)
body: I finished gold in season 6 and didn't receive my rewards (summoner icon,maokai skin , etc.)

replies.body: If you haven't received your rewards for 2016 yet, just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll help out with your specific issue individually and see what happened.  Don't worry, we'll help you out!
